name: Project Cactus Juice
description:
Project Cactus Juice

-March 21st  2113: the Earth is dying and a company called "Savage Corp." believes space travel can save us all. 

-June27th 2133: After finding a small oasis in the Cigar Galaxy showing signs of life , the company sends it's top scientist to do a 90 day research expedition. But  after 10 days of research the crew stopped sending updates.

-July 16th 2133: 5 days ago a currently MIA agent of The Savage Corporation, was sent there to  find out what happened & hopfully mount a rescue... You are that Agent.

                                                                   Notes from Dev.

"I was playing a ton of BioShock, DeadSpace and PREY when I made this so that's where I got the theme but other than that is your average First person game haha"

-2 enemy types(robots & zombies)  & 100+ enemies all together

-9 weapons spread across the map +5 Bonus weapons 

- Pineapples, canteens & med kits for health

-press f1 for controls

- 5 Motion Activated audio logs to flesh out lore

-Also the game has no end goal so.... once you reach the center of the map or kill all the enimies That's It.
